name: THE NEVERLANDS
description:
a simple glitch out of reality to which the only way back is to survive the three entities that lurks about on each under level of the Neverlands and enter the portal to which takes you back to consciousness. If caught by the nasty entities you maybe to transformed into an aspect on the Neverlands just like everyone else who failed to escape. Be brave and you might make it back alive.

WASD to navigate

mouse click to collect, equip and open doors.
